Classes in ch.ffhs.inf09.pa.mashup_platform.common.db used by ch.ffhs.inf09.pa.mashup_platform.common.db
DBLocal
          The base class defines the interface of the local database that is used by the kernel and the web environment to exchange mashup data.
MashupInfo
          This class provides information about a specific mashup
MashupOverview
          This class provides an overview of available mashups.
MashupPage
          This class represents a page.
User
          This class represents a registered user.
